text: Nimuba hamagare kumazina yabase wabo kuko ubwo nibwo buzoba buri mukuri imbere y’Imana, nimwaba mutazi abavyeyi babo, rero nibene wanyu muri mw’idini rimwe n’abagenzi banyu kandi ntamwikomo kuri mwebwe mugize amakosa nkayo mugabo kuri bimwe vyagizwe n’imitima yanyu kubigirampaka, n’Imana niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi n’impuhwe zihagije
